https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Itâ€™s a medical breakthrough that might never have happened - if not for the persistence of one man. A woman is fighting cancer - with the help of a deadly poison. This is the story of a life-saving connection between ancient wisdom and modern science: arsenic, one of the most exciting new developments in the international war on cancer.
